title: Chocolate and orange cup cakes
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '140g (5oz) butter', '225g (8oz) caster sugar', '225g (8oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon cocoa powder', '100ml milk', '2 drops orange flavouring', 'For the icing', '170g (6oz) icing sugar', '85g (3oz) butter', '1/2 cocoa powder', '1 drop orange flavouring', '1 tablespoon milk, or as needed']
